mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_asm_obj (asm_obj_id, project_id, is_cotroller, asm_obj_name, asm_obj_fullname, asm_obj_file_path, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{item.asmObjId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isCotroller,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #(item.asmObjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.asmObjFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.asmObjFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{item.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
